mapper.select:
select seq,subject,content,email,boardtype,joindate,hit from board where email='${email}'
and ${key} like '%' || #{word} || '%'
select d.centername,d.gatheringfee,d.cdonationfee,d.cdonationpurpose from board b,donationboard d where b.seq=d.seq
select b.subject,v.tel,v.centername,v.volunteerkind,v.volunteerdate,v.centerlocation from board b,volunteerboard v where b.seq=v.seq
select p.age,p.kind,p.weight,p.location,b.subject from board b,pparcelboard p where b.seq=p.seq
select d.centername,d.gatheringfee,d.cdonationfee,d.cdonationpurpose from board b,donationboard d where b.seq=d.seq and b.email='${email}'
select b.subject,v.tel,v.centername,v.volunteerkind,v.volunteerdate,v.centerlocation from board b,volunteerboard v where b.seq=v.seq and b.email='${email}'
select p.age,p.kind,p.weight,p.location,b.subject from board b,pparcelboard p where b.seq=p.seq and b.email='${email}'
